concept.title: Upgrade a Full or Basic Installation from the Tarball

conbody.p: upgradefull installation from tarballupgradebasic installation from tarballbasic install from tarballupgradefull install from tarballupgradeWhen you upgrade a full or basic installation from the tarball, you configure the new version to use a new configuration directory outside of the base runtime directory. You then configure the new version to use the same data, log, and resource directories as the previous version. As a result, the new version has access to the pipeline, log, and resource files created in the previous version.
To upgrade a full or basic installation from the tarball, perform the following steps:

ol.li: If the previous version of used a manual start, verify that directories in the previous version are outside of $SDC_DIST, the base runtime directory.
Manually update the environment configuration file.
For an upgrade of the basic installation, install additional stage libraries as needed.
